website_summaries.verdict: A versatile rear camera system at a solid price.
pros: Waterproof camera has 135° viewing angle to clearly display what’s behind you
Monitor is easy to install, and parking guides can be adjusted with a single switch
Mount features a photosensitive sensor so LEDs only come on when needed
cons: Image quality is solid, but screen has been reported to flicker at times

customer_reviews.title: Good clear pix but good luck on your hook up
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this today. seems to work as it should , but if your not electronically inclined you will not get the product from China installed . There is only a diagram for hard wiring no instructions, and Absolutely NO instruction for wireless installation !!! It took me about 2 1/2 hrs trying to figure it out and install. No instructions as to where the monitor power supply should plug in to the monitor .. Says you can find video's for installation on youtube but I never found one and the ph number for them is a China number, Good clear pix but good luck on your hook up !!!
customer_reviews.author: Edd Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Installed very easily (maybe 20 minutes): just mount transmitter/camera to license plate frame, run wire into trunk (I removed the license plater bulb cover, pushed wire through, and then put cover back), then attached the wire to the reverse light. The reverse light had a normal connect and so I crimped two spades and just pushed them. I could have attached to the wires instead, but I had the spades. The receiver just plugs into the cigarette lighter jack, so I coiled the excess wire and zip tied it and then pushed under the ashtray to look neater. Was quite quick. The whole things works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Camera finally got water in it after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the back up camera to my Dodge Charger and everything works perfectly. Simple to install, took about half an hour hardwiring into my reverse lights and using the wireless setup. Screen is perfect sized and picture resolution during the day and night is way better than I expected. Get one! UPDATE: after 4 months water has finally seeped into the camera housing causing the image to be distorted. Ordered a new camera.
customer_reviews.author: Wells First

customer_reviews.title: Use a Battery Case and Have a Portable Unit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I needed an inexpensive solution. I only wanted to use it to hitch up campers, trailers etc on an older model truck. Works like a charm and I couldn't be happier. There is only one modification I made. I bought a I didn't want to wire it directly to the vehicle in case I wanted to use it on other trucks. So I wired the camera part to the battery case and it works like a charm. I can even leave the camera on my license plate and disconnect the battery (though the battery boxes have an on off switch).
customer_reviews.author: The Girl From Limberlost

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inexpensive Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation on my 2010 Nissan Murano. Completed wireless install in less than 3 hours. Every thing works as promised. Most time was spent trying to hide the wiring form the screen without drilling holes in the dash. Settled for some exposed wires I encased in black flex wire conduit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item works just as discribed by seller and is very easy to install. I am upgrading by 4 star review to 5 for the overall experience in obtaining this produce and installing it. As well as how good it has been working this past few months since I have received it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! Works exactly as advertised! Easy to instal and great signal! Seller is very responsive to questions and support! Will do business with this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I did mine as wired (Honda Odyssey Van)
customer_reviews.text: It took me 30 mins at most. The video on Youtube identifies the wiring requirements for wireless, but has sufficient information to convert to wired with the enclosed harness. I am surprised with the image, the measurements, and lastly the ease of install. I would buy this again and with the 2 year warranty, it seems a safe purchase. If you want a basic, clear backup camera system, I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie T. Ocean Shores, WA

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Put on a crew cab truck. In the beginning, living in CA where it never rains it would cut I and put on the monitor. Moved to Wisconsin and found out it is anything but waterproof. The monitor now works when it wants to and when it does want to the image is junk! You can’t see anything through all the condensation inside this piece of junk!!! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! My dad has the same truck with a much better camera on his and he has no issues. You get what you pay for! This is complete garbage!!! I have never rated something this poorly in my life!!! It is Chinese garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Budget priced back up camera with expensive features
customer_reviews.text: Budget priced back up camera with expensive features. Included with the wireless monitor and camera (surprise it has LEDs for improved back up image a night) are both a lighter socket power supply with 90 degree plug as well as a hardwire kit with 90 degree plug and wire taps. Currently installed with accessory adapter. The kit also includes a dash mount bracket and a magnetic swivel mount. I have ordered an add a fuse kit for future hardwire of the unit. The parking lines can be turned on/off and adjusted for width, horizontal and vertical alignment. I prefer them off. The team provided quick email response to an installation question. Great product for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has quick response time for being wireless. The monitor has the view in about 1 second from powering on the camera. The video I have here shows the camera powering up and off a couple times. It comes with everything pictured. This includes 2 different bases for the monitor, multiple cables, etc. As shown. Easy setup. The hardest part is finding a place to run the camera wire from outside the vehicle to the inside depending on your vehicle. Quality is pretty good for the price. Only suggestion I have is to protect the loop antenna on the camera wire. It might be okay but I like to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Easy install, Saturday morning and a cup of coffee to do the install
customer_reviews.text: 2017 Jeep Rubicon. Did not come with a backup camera. Got spoiled to having it. Ordered this and installed in less than 1 hour. Easy install. Recommend checking display after each connection. I got all the cable run and closed up all the compartments and tried the display again, and it did not work. Had to remove tail light and snake cable back out as either I forgot to connect it or it came undone. The wireless connection was great, but something in my area caused interference on the connection. Ran a continuous video cable (Supplied with unit) and life was great.
customer_reviews.author: David M  Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It was not very easy too install. So many variations of cables to cover all the possibilities (which is a good thing, but the instruction were pitiful). Once I got it working the image flicker so much it is most useless. There is an option to hardwire it. I might try that.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G.

customer_reviews.title: Bring Safety to Older Cars
customer_reviews.text: I installed this about 10 days ago in my 2006 Kia Spectra. I have been considering buying a new car so that I could have a backup camera for safety around my kids and the other kids in the neighborhood. I decided to give this one a try before spending 20k on a new car. Installation was surprisingly easy, and the Youtube video in the item description is good. I was worried that the wireless transmitter wouldn't work properly, but everything has been fine up to this point with zero delay.
customer_reviews.author: James Fox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and price
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to install. I installed it on a GMC Envoy and had to use an alternate power source (license plate lights) for the camera. That said, the camera is performing way above my expectations especially for the price. I have no problem recommending the product.
customer_reviews.author: GOls

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Simple, and Versital.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a 2017 Chevrolet City Express Base Model. This model comes without any windows in the rear, making it nearly impossible to see. The ZSMJ Wireless Backup camera was an excellent choice. Things I liked: Clean Packaging, simple directions, comes with more than you actually need. I loved the Option to hardwire verses just Wireless. Things I think could be better: I'm a Computer engineer, so splicing in power was simple, however my recommendation to the average Joe would be to buy some quick taps. Overall the product was quick and easy to install, approximately 45 Minutes. It serves a great purpose, the image display is clean and the instructions were simple.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Meadors

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation and ease to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is wireless and you only need to connect 2 wires from the camera. I spliced into the back-up wires with the connectors that are supplied and the system works great. I installed it on my 2011 GMC extended cab truck and it works great. Glad I bought it because I trailer a lot and it makes back-up a lot easier to connect to your trailer.
customer_reviews.author: dowah

customer_reviews.title: For price "not bad" - works sometimes not sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Wires are really TOO SMALL - be very careful with them. I put this on '03 Chevy Suburban, a large vehicle, and discovered it works sometime and not sometimes. Don't really know if it is transmitter, receiver, wiring, or vehicle size causing problem. I will try several things to get it working better. I think this is not to bad a system for the price. All I wanted was a reasonably priced backup camera to help with hooking up my boat. Maybe I can get this to do the job, eventually. Don't expect too much for the price -- GOOD LUCK.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Bad signal
customer_reviews.text: The product works but i have a 27 foot camper and the signal cuts out constantly. We drove from Western MD to Myrtle Beach and it was static with no picture more than it worked. When stopped at the several gas stops it worked fine though, just not while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service - Two thumbs-up!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible delivery, arrived next day. Product was easy to install & works great as expected. I have purchased a lot of items in the past, but I was most impressed at the follow-thru from the seller. "DoHonest" customer service in my opinion is world class, in respect to the level of service provided, as their only goal was to ensure that I was completely satisfied with the product meet my expectations. I personally will continue to purchase products from this seller, give them a try! I doubt that you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Easy wiring and Good picture.
customer_reviews.text: This wireless backup camera is a good addition to my parents suv (08 Honda CRV). There were some problems when it can to the install. The first problem was the wire for the rear camera were not long enough to reach the reverse light, so I had to buy extra wire to extend the wires. The second problem is that the monitor random turn on when driving and it a problem when driving in the dark because the bright blue screen blinds the driver. Reason why I'm rating it a 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It works great right after I hooked it up. It didn’t take me that long to install it to my 2006 Honda Accord. Thanks to good instructions and wireless transmitter/receiver. All wires are labeled and easy to identify. Good product for the price. Highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: DAP

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Instant on when Reverse. Everything you need is included
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my Ford expedition. Wireless feature works well. Instant on when on reverse. Signal is a bit weak because I placed the antenna outside. It's not an issue for now. I can pull it inside. Easy to install, comes with easy connector that clips onto the reverse light wiring. No special tools needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yam

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, had a slight issue with some interference but seller quickly solved my issue. I installed this on a 2007 Silverado and Needed a stronger receiver. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Randy Loveday

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set up for a vehicle with limited space
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set up for a vehicle with limited space. I installed it in a Jeep Wrangler that has a single DIN radio and limited dash space for a monitor. It fit right above the rear view mirror and works really well. Installation was very easy. I had an issue with the camera out of the box and the seller went above and beyond to resolve the issue. I would highly recommend both the product and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it works sometimes not
customer_reviews.text: It would be good if it worked all the time. Sometimes when I put my car into reverse all I see is a fuzzy screen and a faint image of the parking guide lines and other times by the time the picture comes onto the screen I have already backed out of the parking space. Maybe if it was hard wired instead of useing wireless it may work better I don’t know
customer_reviews.author: George Burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent backup cam for the price. I intend to use mine on different vehicles so I rigged the camera end to be able to be powered by a 12 volt power tool battery and I attached magnets to the rear of the camera bracket. The display end simply plugs into a standard lighter outlet and the magnets from the camera stick to the rear of the vehicle. For what I intend to use it for it works great.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Vague wiring instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions did not make clear the ground connection to the camera. I had to determine which wire was the ground wire and secure it to the frame. I have yet to test it out but the Camera resolution is pretty good. Again, I wiring instructions lacked information on grounding one wire and attaching the second wire to your reverse lights on the setting to only operate one right in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Musicman

customer_reviews.title: Very Great Customer Service and Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother's van and the first one came had some monitor issues. Therefore, I contacted the seller and within a couple hours, he was able to resolve the issue by sending over another one that worked. It was fairly easy to install. You just have to hook it up above your licence plate and find a hole to run the cable into the car to solder it with the backup lights. There was also a transmitter that was part of that split-cable. The cable was small enough so that it can fit through that hole. Once installed, the picture quality and signal were really good. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Edmond

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort, it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit works very well day or night. The connections were not too bad and you can go wireless or direct. My minivan was harder because there is no easy way to get power to the backup camera. ( drilled a hole behind the license plate.)
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised and timely.
customer_reviews.text: So Far so good. This is a gift and has not been installed permanently on the vehicle. I did run it outside with 12v power and everything seems to function as stated. instructions seem easy enough to follow. Update. Installed and working great. Perfect for me hooking up trailer alone! lets me guide in simple. No problem with installation, just use common sense and don't' get in a hurry. Less than an hour from box to install.
customer_reviews.author: William C

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great for the money. I found it to be fairly simple to install, but I have also been in the automotive industry most of my life. I do like the picture clarity and the fact that it has the lines to help along with the fact that it performs like the ones on our other vehicles that are factory. Again, I'd say its totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and quality design. I mounted it on my motorhome and am completely satisfied. I can keep an eye on my towed vehicle and back up with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this camera will buy again !!
customer_reviews.text: ok, so i have a Hyundai Elantra 2016 without a back up camera. i was doing a very long research before i bought the ZSMJ camera and i'm very happy i did , the picture is very clear it took me 15 minutes to install it's very straight forward the camera is water resistant to a very high level as it's working even after rains and car wash screen is good size and you can mount it to your dashboard
customer_reviews.author: Intl FandC

customer_reviews.title: great product for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: great product for a cheap price. Used it in my jeep and mounted it to back bumper. I did not use the wireless function so cant speak to that, I used the hard wire option and works great
customer_reviews.author: AMosley

customer_reviews.title: Wireless backup camera!
customer_reviews.text: The item came faster then expected! Only took a couple of hours to hook up. It works great, clear and you can see really well at night! They give you everything you need to hook it up, no need to purchase any thing else. It is a great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Brown

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for a price a but complex install.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a decent camera but installing it for someone who is technically inclined average person shouldn't attempt this if you arent prepared to take off panels and splice some wires I would suggest a multimeter for polarity testing and some double-sided tape to secure and mount the devices inside the car as the included tape on the screen is a little weak. It's a decent product but you need to be prepared to take some stuff apart to make this look good and function properly. Takes about an hour to install and tune.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley lassitter

customer_reviews.title: It's a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set up,super easy to install. The kit comes with everything you need. It comes so you have your choice of hardwired or wireless. The only thing is,I wish I had gotten a bigger screen. But it will do great with the 4.3" screen. The LED lights on the camera makes it easy to see at night. Overall I am very happy with my purchase,and would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Droid1680

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely a 40 camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a easy install and a plug and go. The camera quality isn't bad by any means WHEN IT WORKS. The feed will flicker and turn off color randomly. I have it hooked up to my backup lights so when I switched to reverse it would turn on. But when I put it in gear the camera won't turn on always, making me change gear and try again. In the end taking 30 seconds or maybe I'll get lucky and it does it first try, you won't know.
customer_reviews.author: The Dawson's

customer_reviews.title: A Small Hiccup
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that were provided did not show that a separate power wire was needed for the monitor. Andy explained this to me in an email. I installed a separate power supply and the monitor powered up. Andy at customer support was easy to work with. I gave it a five star because I think it's a good product. terrykfireman@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: ValJo58

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Lasted one week and really a bad picture.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I should of listened to the reviews. I hooked it up by my knowledge of electrical not by the instructions that were terrible. It worked for about a week and quit working I traced down all the wires and had power where I was supposed to have power and at that point the company started sending me emails saying if it wasn’t working right they would replace it. Over and over they kept saying they were sending me another one and they never did. It must’ve been someone from China because their grammar on the email was horrible. Anyway DO not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Wolf

customer_reviews.title: ... wire to get it to work now it works fine
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to get it to work had to hard wire to get it to work now it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Randy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT add-on backup camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wireless camera so I could connect it to my truck and then also easily move it to my trailer when I was hauling it, and it works great! I was worried about the wireless reception from the back of my 14' trailer, but it still transmits to the cab of my truck with hardly any interference. Great camera for the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Carver

customer_reviews.title: It could not have been much easier to install the ZSMJ Wireless Bkup camera
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Wireless ZSMJ to self install on my 2009 Hyundai to save money. Not being a real handyman, the install went really well attaching the camera to backup lights system. I was very much impressed with how well the color monitor showed the details when putting in reverse. The monitor gives you the option to adjust clarity. The license plate camera installs very easily. Finding and getting to reverse light wires in the trunk lid was the most difficult. Certainly, for cost it was well worth purchase. The instuctions could use some refinement. Other than that, I am very happy to know I will be safer when backing out of a parking space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mount the transmitter as high as you can, preferably inside the trunk rather than outside the car frame.
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality for the price was excellent. Simple installation - only one wire to physically connect with the backup lights - and although the 12v adaptor was not included in the box, the vendor contacted me after the purchase and offered to send me one at no cost. There is some occasional interference with the video signal, but my mounting point for the rear transmitter is low and behind the rear frame, so it was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Legend

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is good along with receiver. Bad part, after 2 days metal plate for magnet dropped off back of monitor, 2 wire clips for accessing power for camera were total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Lemon

customer_reviews.title: I can see behind me!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install if you know what you are doing, otherwise can take it somewhere. Get a little flickering in the monitor when driving sometimes, could be I have a loose wire, BUT, you CAN turn it off with the push of a switch so no problem there! Good lighting, love the assist lines. No regrets on this purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: veganlizard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not install it yet but it looks easy.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Good camera. Took awhile to get it connected to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Took awhile to get it connected to power but overall once I got it setup it worked beautifully. I would highly recommend it for any vehicle or trailer that doesn’t already have a camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bing

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great backup camera system for an older model car! Easy to install (with no wires to hide from back of car to front) and works as expected. Monitor can be mounted where its convenient for you (both adhesive and suction cup mounts are provided). Minor flickering on monitor. Great value for the price (and I'm offered a second system for free!) I'll feel better knowing my teenager has this backup camera, especially at night. I would definitely recommend this system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darn good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn good for everything you get. Screen is good quality, and directions were clear, would definitely get another. Exactly what I needed for towing my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cal

customer_reviews.title: A snap to install!
customer_reviews.text: With basic electronics experience this is a snap to install! I chose to wire the system into the car instead of using the wireless components since I didn't want to worry about possible interference later on. All in all it is a good product that works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: wayne Newburn

customer_reviews.title: Product works great, installation was easy
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, installation was easy. I installed the wired version, instead of wireless, and there was plenty of cable for my F250 crew cab. The hardest part was finding a power supply in the dash. The display sits right under the temperature controls, I did not want it on the dash. Set the camera to the elevation, I wanted for backing up to hook up the boat. The first time backing up to the boat, got the hitch right over the ball. No more getting in and out of cab to make sure I was getting close, when doing it along at 4:00 in the morning. So happen with it, I will get another for the wife's Expedition.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: you don't need everything in the box
customer_reviews.text: my first one was a peak and it worked about 2 minutes, bad picture. Contacted them and they said my Bluetooth affected it. It quit after 3 months. This one has a great picture. I put the sender transmitter behind the spare tire of the truck. Plugged it in, and wow. Could use better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: harold feser

customer_reviews.title: To have a reliable backup camera.
customer_reviews.text: I used this backup camera for my 2013 Chevy Malibu. It works great. This product is wonderful and for a great price. I would recommend this backup camera for anyone. Easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kuda E.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for a Dodge Challenger
customer_reviews.text: This back up camera did not work for me I had to return it due to having difficulties installing it and once I did get it to work the camera looked blurry . Don’t recommend for a Dodge Challenger
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Flores

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My over all review is a (8) out of 10. It's a great little unit for the money. The camera and display are very clear, and the guide lines make it easy to back into anywhere. Having it come with multiple wiring harnesses makes it very versatile and easy to install. Anyone with a basic knowledge of wiring (-+) can install it in an hour or less. The negatives I found are; adhesive for display mounting bracket don't stay stuck, and the night vision can be affected by the snow. Would I recommend this to others? Yes. In fact, I already have!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Christensen

customer_reviews.title: ANTENA INTERFERANCE
customer_reviews.text: loved the item. only problem was I put it in my 26 ft. motorhome and antenna distance was a little to far, but still picks up, just a little interference. I also bought another one for my SUV. good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Listing is misleading But customer service has promised to make this right
customer_reviews.text: Customer service contacted me after the initial review and promised an updated model that will work for my pick up. I will revisit this review when the new model arrives. The listing on Amazon specifically says this bitch a pick up truck. However the information supplied with the device and the details online both specifically say that it is not to be used on a pick up. It does have some interference issues when installed on a pick up that is loaded.
customer_reviews.author: John T Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera system for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Easy installation on my Nissan Titan pickup truck. The camera system comes with multiple mounting options which gives you flexibility on locating the screen. For a wireless camera the image quality seems very good. The kit included everything needed including zip ties, electrical connectors, and extra adhesive tape. Instructions were also easy to follow. Will definitely be usefully when backing up to my camper and hooking up the hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lenzen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had to change the adhesive on the monitor though since it started falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Back up camera
customer_reviews.text: Picture not very clear had it professionally installed don't know if it is camera or monitor left message for the seller waiting to see what they suggest the representative there helped me and now camera works great would buy another when this one finally wears out. The company backs up their products with help support or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Coffelt

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The unit was super easy to install and worked right out of the box. It has decent picture quality and worked well with my 2009 F150. I just hooked it up to the reverse indicator lights and done.
customer_reviews.author: John F Bartoszak

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed on my F150 truck. Was not difficult to do. Many online videos to assist. Picture is very good. I have requested the suction adapter/monitor and they are shipping to me at no charge as mentioned in the descriptions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far no problems.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and I am so far pleased with its performance. No issues thus far. I email the seller over the weekend and was surprised they responded being it was a weekend. Nice to know they are there. My son just started driving and had trouble backing, this helped him judge distance etc. (I still make him use his eyes as well). Will let you know if I experience any problems with rain or any other problems. As I stated, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great product but limited view angle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a great price. Installed very easily.. Only concern I had was the view angle was limited but the seller said they had a 15 degree wider angle version which they would send me. I’m looking forward to getting that and will update my review based on that. Update - I upgraded to 5 stars. The seller sent me a wider angle camera and that allows me to see the corner edges better. Very satisfied and the seller is great.
customer_reviews.author: Zohra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: My 2005 F150 did not have a rear view camera. This makes it so easy to back up with confidence. This wireless camera is so easy. You can attach to the reverse lights for vision while backing up or as I did connect it to the hitch wires. Now I can activate the camera and check the hitch and trailer while traveling. Great feature. As I said it is easy to install. I am referring my friends to THIS camera. Joe H
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy low-cost backup camera I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described very easy to install. Picture quality is very good. Easy to use. Fast delivery. I would recommend this backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works good but the adhesive sucks for being in warm climate
customer_reviews.text: Works good but the adhesive sucks for being in warm climate... Warm not even hot climates... But works well easy to install some interference if ur using ur phone with wireless set up but all is well
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, wireless option was iffy but still a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it, however the wireless wasn't great, ended up using the hardwire option, only other slight complaint is that the screen is pretty bright even when adjusted but isn't a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Great for backing up to a trailer
customer_reviews.text: Came with all shown in Package. Easy installation. Works great for backing up to a trailer by yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: This backup camera works perfectly fine, and for the price I paid it does the job fine. The only thing is a glare coming from the camera that doesn't seem to go.away, other than that the unit works very well. I found that the unit is at its best when you use the direct connection cables.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was unlucky, the camera wouldn’t power up and neither is the cigarette plug adapter it woul not light so I never get the display on I have successfully installed Three Yada camera system very much like this but like I said maybe I got a bad one
customer_reviews.author: olavo48

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bracket for the camera cracked and broke off on installation
customer_reviews.author: RDG25

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad one, will try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Nice image quality, but wireless connection image started blinking and quit working in less that a minute, Placed transmitter and receiver a foot apart, still no image. Used RCA cable for direct connect and picture came back on. LED lights are lit on Transmitter/Receiver, so they are powered. Verified that all connections were good and polarity correct. Transmitter or Receiver is defective.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fram

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions and it's a no go. Worked for a minute and then gone. Tried wiring both ways. Don't buy unless you can go to an installer.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, tried 2nd one and still didint work
customer_reviews.text: this stop working after one day, all power is good and lights are on but no picture, dont buy. tried to install a brand new unit and still didnt work all lights are on and transmitting but still no picture.
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about an hour
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife’s SUV. Hooked everything up and it worked fine for about an hour. Then the LCD wouldn’t come on. Both receiver lights are on but nothing from the LCD. Tried hard wiring it directly still no response from the LCD. At this point it’s 100% the LCD. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Would not maintain camera signal to the display due to the distance between them. Advertised to work "wireless" for the length of my truck but it did not. I contacted the company immediately and was told i would need the more powerful camera transmitter and they would send it, so i had to hard wire it in to make it work. It does have a decent picture so thats why i gave it 3 overall.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great asset for backing-up
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and angle view. The only thing I would add is a distance beep notification. I would recommend this camera. Makes it safer to be in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: ron-mountaintop

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything was real easy to setup. I originally placed the transmitter in a poor location and the signal did not give a good picture, but when I placed the transmitter in a more favorable position, the camera delivered a great picture when backing up. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Having hatchback on my prius I decided to install and ...
customer_reviews.text: Having hatchback on my prius I decided to install and connect transmitter onto hatchback door so I wired it to the license plate lights wires, not to backup light. It is more convenient, kind of a shortcut plus now I can use the camera all the time as long as my daylights are on.
customer_reviews.author: edin

customer_reviews.title: Bought the wireless setup so I wouldn't have to drill ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the wireless setup so I wouldn't have to drill holes In the cab and so I could mount monitor where ever I wanted . Unfortunately that didn't work out for me the picture was so fuzzy had to hard wire in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install the back up camera and monitor myself but was a lot of work running the Cam wires into the Honda Accord trunk and then attaching the two leads to backup light wires. The monitor picture is not very clear but does give me an idea if the area is clear. For the price, it seems like a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: The Mighty SS

customer_reviews.title: I tried it and liked it but I have two problems
customer_reviews.text: I tried it and liked it but I have two problems: 1- The screen kept falling down from the dashboard top or surface, the adhesive is to week. as in the pic. 2- When I keep the power on, I have a flash light on the screen comes on every few seconds and confuse me so I need to turn it off. other wise it is good one.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: Product works well, Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product was very easy to install and set up. It works just as advertised. I had one issue with a defective power cord, but the customer service rep sent me a new one in a couple days. Would definitely recommend - its low price and works well
customer_reviews.author: StringKingLacrosse

customer_reviews.title: All you’ll ever need in a back up camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera came very well packed for shipping. Easy to install. It took maybe 20 minutes to install on my truck. Picture is clear day and night. A great back up camera at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: first one didnt work second one worked for 2 weeks missed my return window and they charged me for the second unit P.O.S. i now have two broken back up cameras and i paid for both. transmitters are no good and they call theirselves doo-honest yea . new name cheap-crap that doesnt work .i just 125.00 dollars
customer_reviews.author: john laing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well...easy installment just tricky connecting to back reverse lights if your not comfortable and knowledgeable about wiring configuration. Great but
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this, I have a PT Cruiser and it has always been a problem seeing out the back, this solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Walter A Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Installation
customer_reviews.text: Installation is very easy it doesn't require to have a lot of knowledge about electric car system. In addition if needed technical support is available. The response to my questions was returned very quickly and written in a very simple language.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Silva

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Set up was easy and did not cause any problems. Only problem I have is he double sided tape did not stick well but that was a easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: AJRowan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Trailer Hookup
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to see trailer hitch when backing up to trailer for exact backup put magnetic tape on back on camera bracket. Works great for what I bought it for with a little weak signal at times wireless if using for longer range a direct cable will need to be used for rear of trailer use. Basic wiring and hookup pretty easy and nice clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: James P Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Is reliably working for months now. Picture quality good enough for a backup camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it's doing its job for several months now, never had any issues. The someone stole the display and I ordered another kit. Didn't even have to exchange the transmitter, just the receiver and the display. They now also added more cables which makes the installation really easy. Great product and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Frey

customer_reviews.title: It comes with everything needed for wired or wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to back up to trailer mainly. Nice product for decent price. The adhesive on Mount didn't last but one day so had to add some gorilla glue. Minimal interference with wireless. Might run wires when I get a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the system in a 2005 Chevy Tahoe to assist when backing up to attach my boat. The system worked perfectly. The adjustable camera allowed me to set it exactly where needed. Installation was easy especially after watching video from the http/ link provided in the instructions. This system is well worth the selling price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need. Easy to install with several options available.piture quality is good. Works on my extra long exposition.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Wireless signal, easy install if you have moderate skills
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Wish I had it earlier, I might not have backed into the post and dented my truck bumper.
customer_reviews.author: pop pop

customer_reviews.title: Foggy bottom
customer_reviews.text: Camera is not all that great, gets foggy in cold and wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Irish

customer_reviews.title: Good Image Quality, No Delay
customer_reviews.text: Good image quality, and no perceptible delay in the video. I bought it for a Bobcat skid steer due to the poor rear visibility, and it works very well. Having it makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Swanson

product_meta.title: DoHonest Wireless Backup Camera and 4.3'' Monitor Kit, HD Color, Suitable for Cars,SUVs,Minivans,UTVs IP69 Waterproof Rear/Front View Camera - P7
product_meta.description:
If you need an inexpensive wireless rear view camera system, the DoHonest camera system is just what you need. It has wide angle lens at 135 degrees and the transmission is good for vehicle under 23ft. If you want the best wireless backup camera for under $50, you can’t go wrong with it!






Features

1.Quick and simple setup

2.2nd wired front/rear camera can be installed to monitor

3,Camera with Intelligent switch can on/off guide lines,switched mirrored/facing view makes the backup cameras can used for front facing camera.

5,Camera is IP69 waterproof and has 6 LED lights for night vision

6, No color difference. When you use it, you will see that the trees are green and the sea is blue.






4.3 inch Monitor Specification

Resolution: 960 (W) × 576 (H)

Signal format: PAL / NTSC. Compatible with all signal formats

Rated Voltage: 9V - 35V, 400mA - 20A






Built-in Camera Specification

Image sensor: PC 7070 (Distance reference marking display)

Resolution:800 TV lines

Video output: RCA connector, 1.0vp - p750hm

Power: 9V - 14V DC ,400mA - 20A

Waterproof grade: IP69

Effective Pixels: 648 X 488 pixels / NTSC






Package Included

1 x 4.3 inch LCD Monitor

1 x Built-in Wireless Backup Camera

1 x Cigarette Lighter Adapter with on/off switch

1 x User Manual




Note:The backup camera system just used under 23ft vehicle(only compatible Cars/SUVs/Vans/UTVs,not compatible to other vehicles such as Pickups,Trucks,Trailer Camper 5th Wheel because of signals interference
feature_bullets: Upgrade the latest HD camera with clear image. IP69 Waterproof HD 720P Super Night Vision Rear Camera With 6 LED light , You can get super HD image day and night.

The wireless built-in backup camera can be powered from the reverse lights, which will be used when reversing，or can be powered from the running lights/12V battery，which will be used when driving use.

Quick and simple setup. Just attach the 4.3 inch LCD monitor to you dash or mount to the windshield. And plug it into your cigarette power outlet. The camera can be mounted with license plate screws. No need to drill a hole.

With a Intelligent switch. You can turn on/off guide lines,flip images mirrored/facing/vertical flip/horizontal flip, adjust the width/length/downward angle for guide lines, which make parking safely and effortlessly.

A professional instruction is included. Also: With the 2 years Warranty, free tech support and replacement service; we know you will be pleased with this camera. (All support and services via email at: dohonest@outlook.com ). ★ NOTE ★ THE SYSTEM IS ONLY COMPATIABLE with Cars,Sedans,SUVs,Minivans,Pickups Under 23ft Vechicle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars670 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
